"(For what it's worth, version 1.0.2.1 of SQL Power Doc does NOT do this, meaning some permissions could be excluded from the documentation. I'll have a new beta that fixes this posted within the next week or two)"
Yes, it's included in version 1.0.2.2 which I published recently. Grab it from the downloads tab and you're good to go!
